U

uncheck(String) - Method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.AnalysisPanel
Unchecks the specified analysis without firing an action event.
uncheckAnalysis(String) - Method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.AllPanelController
Uncheck the specified analysis on the analysis panel.
unPauseCA() - Method in class cellularAutomata.CAController
Restarts the CA, but only if the CA was running when pauseCA() was called.
UNSAVED_DATA - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.Cell
String used when firing property change events to indicate that there is unsaved data.
UNUSUAL_SHAPES - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.rules.util.RuleFolderNames
Rules with very unusual shapes are placed into the folder with this name.
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class cellularAutomata.analysis.Analysis
This method handles mouse "drawing" events on the CA graphics (drawn on the Lattice).
update() - Method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.CAFrame
Update all of the graphics panels and the frame.
update(boolean) - Method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.CAFrame
Update all of the graphics panels and the frame.
update() - Method in class cellularAutomata.lattice.view.LatticeView
Updates the cellular automaton graphics by repainting.
UPDATE_AT_END - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.CurrentProperties
Key to the property that determines whether the graphics should be updated at the end or more frequently.
UPDATE_AT_END_STRING - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.graphics.StartPanel
String used for the update at end radio button display and used to set the button's action command.
UPDATE_EVERY_STEP_STRING - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.graphics.StartPanel
String used for the update every generation radio button display and used to set the button's action command.
UPDATE_GRAPHICS - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.CurrentProperties
Key to the property that indicates the graphics should be updated.
UPDATE_INCREMENT_STRING - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.graphics.StartPanel
String used for the update every nth generation radio button display and used to set the button's action command.
updateGraphics() - Method in class cellularAutomata.lattice.view.listener.AnalysisDrawingListener
Makes sure that the JPanel is updated to reflect any changes.

Makes sure that the JPanel is updated to reflect any changes.
updateGraphicsPanel() - Method in class cellularAutomata.CAController
Update only the graphics panel -- but note that this means also setting the lattice and properties to make sure that CAGraphics isn't using local copies.
updatePropertiesFromFile(String) - Method in class cellularAutomata.CurrentProperties
Get a list of properties from a file.
updatePropertiesFromSimulationFile(String) - Method in class cellularAutomata.CurrentProperties
Update properties from a simulation (.ca) file.
updateRuleGeneratedInitialStates() - Method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.InitialStatesPanel
Change the radio buttons to reflect the latest selected rule (each rule can generate a list of initial states).
updateRuleNumberTip() - Method in class cellularAutomata.graphics.AllPanelController
Change the rule number tip (and the random number button tip) so that it tells the user what numbers are available.
updateState(Cell[]) - Method in class cellularAutomata.Cell
Updates the cell's state based on the rule.
updateUI() - Method in class cellularAutomata.util.CAFileChooser
This is a workaround for java bug 6317789.
updateUI() - Method in class cellularAutomata.util.MultilineLabel
Alter the look and feel so that the underlying JTextArea looks like a JLabel.
updateValue() - Method in class cellularAutomata.lattice.view.listener.CellValueListener
Forces this listener to update the status panel display by using whatever mouse event last occured.
upperBound - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.rules.ALifePi
Highest possible value represented by each chromosome when searching for Pi.

Finds a resource (file) with the given name and returns as a URI.

USER_RULES_FOLDER - Static variable in class cellularAutomata.rules.util.RuleFolderNames
